analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol#164-166) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol#263-301)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol#379-402)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol#473-487)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol#491-510)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol#573-577) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol#312-332):
	External calls:
	- ! TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol#328-329)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol#329-330)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol#605-620) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol#619)

GivethCampaign.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol#540) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol#583-584)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol#573-577)
	- /unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol#576

ERC20Token.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol#36)
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/22/0xc0a1f89bbcaddab4b736e786b6b16c67bc92ed35.sol#135-136)
